abilities.title: Trick shot
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, if no characters in this Unit are Engaged, choose an enemy Unit in LOS. The chosen Unit suffers and removes all it's . Covert Operations Each character in this Unit may . If one or more characters end this movement within 4 of en enemy character, this Unit immediately makes a focus action and characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter [1] until the end of the Turn. Deadeye Characters in this Unit have Sharpshooter [2] . When a character in this Unit makes a attack, the target does not benefit from Cover . Special Forces Sniper This Unit may make a combat action up to two times during its activation instead of the normal one.
